de: The hostel is located in the heart of the medieval village on the pedestrian precinct. Our cuisine is traditional. The menu varies according to the products of the market, in a concern of working the local products. Vegetarian formula.
ru: The hostel is located in the heart of the medieval village on the pedestrian precinct. Our cuisine is traditional. The menu varies according to the products of the market, in a concern of working the local products. Vegetarian formula.
en: The hostel is located in the heart of the medieval village on the pedestrian precinct. Our cuisine is traditional. The menu varies according to the products of the market, in a concern of working the local products. Vegetarian formula.
it: The hostel is located in the heart of the medieval village on the pedestrian precinct. Our cuisine is traditional. The menu varies according to the products of the market, in a concern of working the local products. Vegetarian formula.
fr: L’auberge est située au coeur du village médiéval sur la place piétonne. Notre cuisine est traditionnelle. La carte varie selon les produits du marché, dans un souci de travailler les produits locaux. Formule végétarienne.
zh: The hostel is located in the heart of the medieval village on the pedestrian precinct. Our cuisine is traditional. The menu varies according to the products of the market, in a concern of working the local products. Vegetarian formula.
es: The hostel is located in the heart of the medieval village on the pedestrian precinct. Our cuisine is traditional. The menu varies according to the products of the market, in a concern of working the local products. Vegetarian formula.
nl: De herberg bevindt zich in het hart van het middeleeuwse dorp op het voetgangersgebied. Onze keuken is traditioneel. Het menu varieert afhankelijk van de producten van de markt, in een zorg van de werking van de lokale producten. Vegetarische formule.
